## [Point](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/point)

### Methods

|                                      Method                                       | Return type |                  Brief description                  |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| [getX()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/point#getX()) | `Number`    | Gets the horizontal coordinate, measured in points. |
| [getY()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/slides/point#getY()) | `Number`    | Gets the vertical coordinate, measured in points.   |
